text.name: sys_description
text.text: The Sufami Turbo is an accessory for the Super Famicom. It consists of a cartridge shaped device that allows for the use of 1-2 smaller cartridges that are inserted into the top. It is often compared to the similiar Alladin Disk Enhancer device, with one major difference being that Bandai received official manufacturing and publishing rights from Nintendo.
